short_summary: Acquisition of 139 mattresses and related supplies for Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
description: The Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contract to acquire mattresses and other sleeping supplies for the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Procurement ID: WS4324150000
#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Overview
We are seeking a contractor to provide 139 mattresses of various sizes to the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA). The specifications for the mattresses are outlined in Annex “B”.

**Summary of Deliverables**

* 16 super single bed mattresses (three-quarter) with dimensions 48" x 75"
* 62 super single bed mattresses (three-quarter) with dimensions 48" x 80"
* 12 double bed mattresses with dimensions 54" x 75"
* 49 double bed mattresses with dimensions 54" x 80"

All mattresses must be delivered to Rigaud, Quebec, by February 23, 2024.

### Canadian Content Policy

This procurement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods. In the event of multiple compliant bids that offer Canadian goods, those bids will be prioritized, and other bids will not be considered.

### Tender Details

* Publication Date: November 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* Amendment Date: December 12, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: January 15, 2024
* Tender Status: Cancelled

### Key Contacts

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* Contact: Darya Kritova, darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information

* Tender documents can be accessed through Ariba Discovery at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18105014](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18105014).
* Interested contractors should submit their proposals electronically prior to the closure of the tender.
